file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-12-12-04 - MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the main-door actuation system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM 52-12-12-000-801-A STAIRS DOOR CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM 52-12-12-400-801-A STAIRS DOOR CHARGING VALVE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-12-12 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-12-12-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the main-door actuation system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114CR Nose hydraulic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose hydraulic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ELEC PUMP 1 circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open access door 114CR of the nose hydraulic compartment (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) Totally release the pressure from the hydraulic system AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802- A/200. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-12 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Totally release the pressure from the fluid chamber of the hydraulic accumulator of the main-door actuation system. For this, open the discharge valve and monitor the pressure gage until it shows the nitrogen precharge. (5) Slowly open the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator to let all pressure in it go out. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING:THE HYDRAULIC SYSTEM CONTAINS PHOSPHATE-ESTER HYDRAULIC FLUID. THE FLUID CAN CAUSE IRRITATION IN YOUR SKIN OR INJURY TO YOUR EYES. USE THE APPLICABLE RUBBER GOGGLES AND GLOVES. IF THE FLUID TOUCHES YOU, FLUSH YOUR SKIN WITH WATER. IF IT GETS IN YOUR EYES, FLUSH THEM WITH WATER AND GET MEDICAL HELP. (1) Remove the charging valve (1). (2) Remove and discard the O-ring (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-12 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR Charging Valve - Removal/Installation Figure 401 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-12-12 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-12-12-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 3. MAIN-DOOR ACTUATION-SYSTEM CHARGING VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the main-door actuation system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - LANDING GEAR AND MAIN DOOR ACCUMULATOR - AMM TASK 12-13-06-600-801-A/300 CHARGE HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP IPC 52-12-00 MAIN DOOR - LIFTING AND LOWERING SYSTEM C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114CR Nose hydraulic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring IPC 52-12-00 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose hydraulic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install a new O-ring (2) in the charging valve (1). (2) Install the charging valve (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-12-12 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Pressurize the nitrogen chamber of the hydraulic accumulator (AMM TASK 12-13-06-600-801-A/300). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the ELEC PUMP 1 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (3) Pressurize hydraulic system 1 ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (4) Do a check on the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator for leaks. (5) Close access panel 114CR of the nose hydraulic compartment (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-12-12 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
